mapper.insert: insert into NDr2_Door (devid, regid, readerno, doorname, devisused, iskquse, blackcardver, dvrname, dvrchannel) values (#{devid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{regid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{readerno,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{doorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{devisused,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{iskquse,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{blackcardver,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dvrname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dvrchannel,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.update:
update NDr2_Door
devid = #{devid,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
regid = #{regid,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
readerno = #{readerno,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
doorname = #{doorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
devisused = #{devisused,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
iskquse = #{iskquse,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
blackcardver = #{blackcardver,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
dvrname = #{dvrname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dvrchannel = #{dvrchannel,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
where doorid = #{doorid}
